snippet: Philadelphia, which had four picks in the first two rounds, swapped places with D.C. United to acquire the No. 1 selection over all in the M.L.S. draft and chose Andre Blake, Connecticut’s goalkeeper.
abstract: Philadelphia Union, which had four picks in the first two rounds, swaps places with DC United to acquire the No. 1 selection over all in the MLS draft and chooses Andre Blake, Connecticut’s goalkeeper; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia, which had four picks in the first two rounds, swapped places with D.C. United to acquire the No. 1 selection over all in the M.L.S. draft and chose Andre Blake, Connecticut’s goalkeeper.

headline.main: Goalkeeper Is Top Pick in M.L.S. Draft
headline.print_headline: Goalkeeper Is Top Pick in M.L.S. Draft
